channel.title: Legacy - Pre Evolution of Combat PK Server | Custom Kill Streak System
channel.description:
Welcome. You've just found the ultimate newschool runescape private server. We offer you the real experience player killing from what you remember from 2010 - 2013. The concept of Legacy is that you login. You have a pre-set tab. So you can immediately start player killing. Or start grind your skills towards the completionist cape!
Visit our Official website to play. [url=http://www.Konsulent.org]www.Konsulent.org [/url]
[ul][*]Full summoning, Wolpertinger, steel titan & pack yack. All special effects are working. [*]All newschool items are working properly: Chaotic weapons, Arcane stream, spirit shields, pvp armors, korasi's sword, Nex armor effects. [*]An unique economy based on Tickets. Grind your power weapons and defeat your oponent! [*]Bossing are also an option on Konsulent. We offer Godwars, Nex, Queen black dragon. The full fight cave minigame and soon to come Fight Kiln! [*]22 skills are working, these have competitive Exp rates![/ul]
Over 20 pre-sets. They set your spellbook, equipment, prayerbook and inventory! [IMG]https://media.giphy.com/media/3o7aby5AJOwcCvnXUc/giphy.gif[/img]
Queen Black Dragon [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JZQQ2Lo.png[/img]
Custom Kill Streak system. With bounty hunter skulls [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/16A2aIS.png[/img] Full working Fight Caves. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PcI1gyr.png[/img]

@Konsulent wrote:

Welcome. You’ve just found the ultimate newschool runescape private server. We offer you the real experience player killing from what you remember from 2010 - 2013.
The concept of Legacy is that you login. You have a pre-set tab. So you can immediately start player killing. Or start grind your skills towards the completionist cape!
